feed.title: wweb.dev
feed.subtitle: Stay up to date with weekly updates, get resources for next project and read articles and tutorials about web development.

entry.title: Pure CSS Loader Generator
entry.summary: A code generator that helps you to create simple CSS spinners. You can choose between four different types of CSS spinners and customize them by adjusting the settings.
entry.content: A code generator that helps you to create simple CSS spinners. You can choose between four different types of CSS spinners and customize them by adjusting the settings.

entry.title: Coding your own AI in 2023 with fastai
entry.summary: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.
entry.content: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.

entry.title: Best of Weekly Resources 2019-2022
entry.summary: Exactly three years ago I published my first weekly newsletter. Since then I've sent out 125 Emails with a total of 1345 resources. Here are the 110 most clicked links.
entry.content: Exactly three years ago I published my first weekly newsletter. Since then I've sent out 125 Emails with a total of 1345 resources. Here are the 110 most clicked links.

entry.title: Next.js Web App Template
entry.summary: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.
entry.content: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.

entry.title: Blur Background CSS Generator
entry.summary: A tool to generate the CSS for a customized blur background. Afterward, you can easily copy the code and use it on your website.
entry.content: A tool to generate the CSS for a customized blur background. Afterward, you can easily copy the code and use it on your website.

entry.title: Next.js Micro-blogging Template
entry.summary: A Next.js template for a twitter-like blog. You can write in markdown and upload images and videos.
entry.content: A Next.js template for a twitter-like blog. You can write in markdown and upload images and videos.

entry.title: Next.js Blog Template
entry.summary: This is a simple blog template to quickly get started with writing. It has a clean design and provides a lot of flexibility.
entry.content: This is a simple blog template to quickly get started with writing. It has a clean design and provides a lot of flexibility.

entry.title: JavaScript Object Functions Cheat Sheet
entry.summary: A Cheat Sheet to quickly find all functions that can be executed on a JavaScript Object. It includes a quick explanation, the syntax and an example.
entry.content: A Cheat Sheet to quickly find all functions that can be executed on a JavaScript Object. It includes a quick explanation, the syntax and an example.

entry.title: Responsive Navigation Generator
entry.summary: Quickly get the HTML and CSS for a customizable menu. It will be responsive and it turns to a burger menu on mobile, completely without JavaScript.
entry.content: Quickly get the HTML and CSS for a customizable menu. It will be responsive and it turns to a burger menu on mobile, completely without JavaScript.

entry.title: Getting Started with Serverless AWS (3/3) - Micro Services using Lambda, DynamoDB & API Gateway

entry.title: Getting Started with Serverless AWS (2/3) - Distribute an S3 Bucket with CloudFront and add a Domain
entry.summary: In this part we're going to add CloudFront to deliver our website content with low latency to the user. Afterward, we'll add a domain with HTTPs for our website...
entry.content: In this part we're going to add CloudFront to deliver our website content with low latency to the user. Afterward, we'll add a domain with HTTPs for our website...

entry.title: Getting Started with Serverless AWS (1/3) - Deploying a Static Website to S3
entry.summary: In this series, we're creating a serverless stack using AWS. In this part, I'll show how to serve a static website through an S3 Bucket and how to deploy from your local machine...
entry.content: In this series, we're creating a serverless stack using AWS. In this part, I'll show how to serve a static website through an S3 Bucket and how to deploy from your local machine...

entry.title: How to craft appealing websites

entry.title: How to build a static website without frameworks using npm scripts
